 2013-09972013-10-01,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of HASSAN KHOSROWSHAHI of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 29, 2016, in the place of Jock A. Finlayson.
